xxl.core.relational.query.operators
Class Mappings

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.relational.query.operators.Mappings

public class Mappings
extends Object

This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a mapping node in a directed acyclic graph. Beside the methods, it contains constants for identifying local metadata fragments inside an operator node's global metadata, methods for accessing them and local metadata factories for updating them.

See Also:
Node

Field Summary
static String MAPPING_PREFIX
          This constant is used to generate unique identifiers for the mappings inside the mapping operator's global metadata.
static String OPERATOR_TYPE
          This constant can be used to denote that a node represents a mapping operator in the directed acyclic graph.
static Function<Object,ResultSetMetaData> RESULTSET_METADATA_FACTORY
          A local metadata factory that can be used to create/update the metadata fragment describing the relational data of a mapping operator.
static Function<Object,MetaDataProvider<CompositeMetaData<Object,Object>>> TRANSLATION_FUNCTION
          A factory method that can be used to translate a logical mapping operator into an appropriate implementation.
static Function<Object,Node> XML_READER
          A factory method that can be used to transform the XML representation of a mapping operator into the node itself.
static Function<Object,Node> XML_WRITER
          A factory method that can be used to transform a mapping operator into its XML representation.
 
Method Summary
static Node newMapping(Node input, Iterator<? extends Node> mappings)
          Creates a new mapping operator that applies the mappings given by the specified iteration to its relational data.
static Node newMapping(Node input, Node... mappings)
          Creates a new mapping operator that applies the given mappings to its relational data.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

newMapping

public static final Node newMapping(Node input,
                                    Iterator<? extends Node> mappings)
Creates a new mapping operator that applies the mappings given by the specified iteration to its relational data. The mapping operator gets its relational data from the given operator node.

Parameters:
input - the operator node providing the relational data for the mapping operator.
mappings - an iteration over the mappings to be applied.
Returns:
a new mapping operator that applies the mappings given by the specified iteration to its relational data.

newMapping

public static final Node newMapping(Node input,
                                    Node... mappings)
Creates a new mapping operator that applies the given mappings to its relational data. The mapping operator gets its relational data from the given operator node.

Parameters:
input - the operator node providing the relational data for the mapping operator.
mappings - the mappings to be applied.
Returns:
a new mapping operator that applies the given mappings to its relational data.
